name: Samurott
flavorText:
One swing of the sword incorporated in
its armor can fell an opponent. A simple
glare from one of them quiets everybody.

previous.name: Dewott
previous.flavorText:
Strict training is how it learns its
flowing double-scalchop technique.

next.name: Patrat
next.flavorText:
Using food stored in cheek pouches,
they can keep watch for days. They use
their tails to communicate with others.

pokemon.name: Oshawott
pokemon.flavorText:
It fights using the scalchop on its
stomach. In response to an attack,
it retaliates immediately by slashing.

pokemon.name: Dewott
pokemon.flavorText:
Strict training is how it learns its
flowing double-scalchop technique.
